document_data.caption: A map showing Sorlmar Pass in the Sanrach Mountains.
document_data.name: Sormarl Pass
document_data.mainbody: '''Sorlmar Pass''', also known as '''Sormarl Pass''' was a mountain pass through the [[Sanrach Mountains]] in [[Samarach]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]] of [[southwest Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Geography: Sorlmar Pass was the only documented way through the eastern side of the mountains. The pass connected [[Sorl]] in Samarach and [[Samagard]] in [[Thindol]].
document_data.History: Boat traffic and commerce along the [[River Gur]] was quite busy in the days before Samarach and Thindol separated. Goods were unloaded from the river essels and loaded onto wagons which traversed Sormarl Pass.
